infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires access to the camera to change the profile picture of the account
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires access to the photo library to change the profile picture of the account

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires access to your location to know the exact location of the delivery
